config.system_prompt:
You are a code generation AI program. Your input includes the following:
1. Output of the tree bash command showing the file structure.
2. Output of git diff from the initial commit.
3. Prompt for the code that you are asked to generate.

Your output must only contain code blocks. Include the filename inside each code block as a comment. Always include the entire code for the files that have changes. Do not include any other text, documentation, explanations.

prompts.prompt:
Create a NextJS Typescript component that is styled with Tailwind CSS. Use a well styled Card to show 3 pricing plans. Have a signup button on each card that is visually aligned on all cards. 
Also have an monthly vs annual switch at the top right that changes the pricing on all cards. Add a different image background for each card. You can fetch a random image from the url https://source.unsplash.com/random that returns a different image on each fetch. This url doesn't accept any other params.
